short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just a simple Chrome extension to toggle designMode on and off (Chrome supports only)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you want change the content of web pages, you'll have to grope in the elements tab finding the element that contains the text you want to edit, or turn on the console and type document.designMode = 'on', which is kinda inconvenient, this tool simply performs the command for you just by toggling the designMode on and off.
